text:
NEWS: Gemini now creates PDFs.

Here's exactly how, in simple steps:

1. Go to Gemini. 
2. Click on 'tools' and select 'Canvas'.
3. Make sure it's on 'Thinking' (bottom left).
4. Use my prompt guide: https://lnkd.in/dh6g5MNd. 

I asked for a short Solar System PDF with definitions, a blank diagram, a matching task.

It’s fully editable and ready to download and print.

Why it matters:
 • You can adjust materials to any reading level fast.
 • You can turn any resource into a worksheet. 
 • You can create lesson plans faster.
